channel.title: Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee
channel.description: Recent content on Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee

item.title: Research
item.description: My work can also be found here. Publications Papers: 2017. Defocalization in Cantonese right dislocation. Gengo Kenkyu 152: 59-87. Proceedings: 2020. TITLE. CONFERENCE. -- 2020. Expressing ignorance beyond the nominal domain in Japanese: a comparative view. JK 26. 2020. Defending the notion of defocus in Cantonese. Yue 22. 2020. Quantifier-Raising a head. GLOW in Asia 12 & SICOGG 21. 2019. Head movement with semantic effects: Aspectual verb raising in Cantonese.

item.title: Recent
item.description: Handouts/slides 2019, Nov. M-zi ‘not know’ in Cantonese as an epistemic marker, at CUSP-12, USC. 2019, Nov. Verb doubling and Cyclic Linearization, at Syntax+, USC. 2019, Aug. Quantifier-Raising a head, at GLOW-in-Asia XII in Seoul and SICOGG XXI, Dongguk University. 2019, May. Strength in possibility modals: From weak necessity to strong possibility, at IACL-27, Kobe City University of Foreign Studies. Upcoming presentations 2020, Sept 18-20. Strength in deontic modals as acceptability and optimality, at NACCL-32, UConn.
